resourceType.description: Information about an individual or animal receiving health care services

active.description: Whether this patient record is in active use.

name.description: A name associated with the patient.

telecom.description: A name associated with the patient.

gender.description: The gender that the patient is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

birthDate.description: The date of birth for the individual.

deceasedBoolean.description: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

deceasedDateTime.description: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

multipleBirthBoolean.description: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

multipleBirthInteger.description: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

contact.description: A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient.

communication.description: A language which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health.

managingOrganization.description: Organization that is the custodian of the patient record.

link.description: Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual person.
